doc.field: "Illustrated Amateur Magazine: Art, Music, Tales, Poetry, Drama - A Magazine for Amateurs, Contributed To By Amateurs, And Owned By Amateurs," Volume I, Number 5
"Illustrated Amateur Magazine: Art, Music, Tales, Poetry, Drama - A Magazine for Amateurs, Contributed To By Amateurs, And Owned By Amateurs," Volume I, Number 5
Proprietors: "The Misses Strickland, of Holmdale, Tweedy Road, Bromley, Kent [England]"

Contributors: Agnes Strickland, Ashton Shere, Diana Mary Strickland, L.F. Riches, Joseph Heap, Margaret Strickland, Maud Kelvin, Otto B. Hatchard, Stanley Hastings Tatham, T. Townshend & E. Winder, W. Hastings Smith
Featuring: Announcements, Cartoon Illustrations, Correspondence, Editorial Column, Fiction Serials, Libretto for "Beauty & The Beast" at the Royal I.A.M. Theatre Pantomime [Part II], Music Column, Watercolor Paintings - Landscapes, Portraits
